location: Near Taipei 101, Cihui Mansion (慈暉華廈)
notes: Recently renovated interior with clean white walls, polished tile floors, recessed lighting, and split AC units. The building exterior appears older (7-story walk-up with no elevator visible). Very spacious unfurnished layout with good natural light from windows and balcony. Baby-safe with no visible stairs inside, smooth floors, and rounded corners. Excellent location near Taipei 101 in Xinyi district.
